channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KY

item.title: Report X-2024072441
item.description:
Report X-2024072441

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-05T15:15:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-25
  • City: WALTON
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE METRO SUPERVISOR CAME OVER TO DMP AND INFORMED US OF A LEAKING PACKAGE AT SPOT 637. UPON ARRIVAL RESPONDER NOTICED THE FLAMMABLE LIQUID DIAMOND HAZARD LABEL, PUT ON THE APPRORPIATE PPE, AND GRABBED THE DECISION TREE. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE RESPONSE STEPS AND CONTAINED THE SPILL AND CLEANED UP WHAT SPILLED OUT. THEN TOOK IT BACK TO DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

  • Description: PACKAGE WAS PLACED ON BELT. IT MADE ITS WAY TO THE DA WHERE IT WAS DISCOVERED TO BE SLOWLY LEAKING. RESPONDERS WERE CALLD TO THE DA AND PACKAGE WAS PICKED UP.
